Name: "Camp Followers"
Description: Each time this unit Activates, it suffers 1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.

Name: A Man Freed, A Name Owed
Description: When Jaqen is destroyed, your opponent may target 1 of your Combat Units. It suffer 3 Wounds. As 1 of these Wounds, they may destroy 1 Infantry Attachment in that unit.

Name: Abundant Promises
Description:
• **Precision**
• After completing a Melee Attack, remove any number of Pillage tokens from this unit. For each token removed, this unit restores 2 Wounds.

Name: Acute Precision
Description: This unit's Attacks gain **Precision**.

Name: Adaptive
Description: When building your army, reduce the cost of 1 Attachment in this unit by 1.

Name: Advantage Strike
Description: When Attacking enemies that have not Activated this Round, this unit's Melee Attacks may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Aerial Scouting
Description:
• Once each Turn, when this unit performs a Maneuver or March Action, before resolving that Action, this model's Skinchanger unit may perform a 2" shift.
• Each time an enemy performs a Melee Attack on this unit, the Attacker gains **Precision**.

Name: Affiliation: Bloody Mummers

Name: Ambush

Name: Arrow Volley

Name: Bardiche
Description: • **Vicious**

Name: Battle Prayer
Description:
This unit begins the game with 1 **Faith token**. Each time it passes a Morale Test, it gains 1 Faith token. Faith tokens may be expended to do the following:
**• When an enemy is performing an Attack on this unit, after rolling Defense Dice:**
This unit blocks +1 Hit, +1 additional Hit for each of its destroyed ranks.
**• When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:**
This Attack gains Sundering and may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Battle Scars
Description: Each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, Choose 1. For each destroyed rank in this unit, choose +1: • Vicious • This unit may re-roll any Attack Dice. • This unit rolls its highest Attack Die Value.

Name: Bear Cavalry
Description:
• Each model in this unit has 4 Wounds.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver Action.

Name: Beric's Vassal
Description: This model counts as Beric Dondarrion for all abilities and effects.

Name: Berserker Axes
Description: Gains +1 to Hit for each of this unit’s destroyed ranks.

Name: Berserker's Fervor
Description: For each of this units destroyed ranks, it gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and +1 to Morale Test rolls.

Name: Black Fire
Description:
• **Vicious**
• Hits from this Attack cannot be blocked. If this Attack generates **any** Hits, instead of rolling Defense Dice, the Defender suffers D3 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its remaining ranks, and 1 enemy in Short Range of the Defender becomes **Panicked**.

Name: Blade and Fang
Description: • **Vicious**

Name: Bloodrider
Description: This unit cannot become Weakened.

Name: Bloodriders' Arakh
Description:
• **Sundering**
• **Vicious**

Description: • Sundering • If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, when performing an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, the Defender becomes Panicked.

Name: Boisterous Charisma
Description: Each time this unit passes a Panic Test, target 1 enemy unit in Short Range. They become Vulnerable or Weakened.

Name: Boldness and Courage
Description: Each time this unit Attacks, if it has full ranks, it gains +1 Attack Die. Otherwise, it is treated as having +1 rank for Attack Dice.

Name: Bolt Thrower
Description:
• **Vicious**
• Measures Range and Line of Sight from any part of this unit's tray.
• May suffer -3 to Hit to ignore Line of Sight and gain **Unlimited Range**.
• Defenders do not roll Defense Dice.
• If the Defender is Cavalry, Monster or War Machine, this Attack deals 2 Hits for each success.

Name: Bonded Bear
Description:
• This unit has 3 Wounds.
• Cannot Control Objectives and cannot grant Victory Points.
• When this unit is selected, deploy it fully within Short Range of other friendly Free Folk units, and at least 1” from any enemy unit.
• At the start of any Round, if this unit is not in Short Range of other friendly Free Folk unit, it is destroyed.
• This unit does not Activate as normal. Instead, once per Turn, when this model’s Skinchanger unit Activates, this unit Activates immediately after them.
• Enemies engaged with this unit suffer -1 to Defense Dice Rolls.

Name: Bonded Boar
Description:
• This unit has 3 Wounds and cannot grant Victory Points.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver Action.
• At the start of any Round, if this unit is not in Long Range of Borroq’s unit, it is destroyed.
• This unit does not Activate as normal. Instead, when Borroq’s unit Activates, this unit Activates immediately after them.

Name: Bonded Eagle
Description: At the start of each Round, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. Attach this card to that enemy until the end of the Round, placing this model near the unit's tray to mark it. This model is ignored for all other purposes.

Name: Bonded Skinchanger
Description:
• When this unit is deployed, select Bear, Eagle, or Wolf. See that unit's card for additional effects.
• When this unit is destroyed, remove it's bonded animal.

Name: Bonded Wolf
Description: At the start of each Round, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. Attach this card to that enemy until the end of the Round, placing this model near the unit's tray to mark it. This model is ignored for all other purposes.

Name: Bookkeeping (Cortnay Penrose)
Description: As long as Cortnay Penrose is on the battlefield, increase your Tactics Hand Size limit by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when refilling your hand.

Name: Bookkeeping (Samwell Tarly)
Description: As long as Samwell Tarly is on the battlefield, increase your Tactics Hand Size limit by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when refilling your hand.

• **Vicious**

Before rolling Attack Dice, choose 1:
• Attack gains **Critical Blow**
• Attack gains **Sundering**
• Defender becomes **Panicked**.
After completing this Attack, if it did not destroy an enemy rank, the Attacker suffers 2 Wounds.

**• Vicious**

While this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, all friendly units in Short Range gain +1 to Morale Test rolls and suffer -1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.

Name: Heart of Fire
Description:
This unit begins the game with 1 **Faith token**. Each time it passes a Morale Test, it gains 1 Faith token. Faith tokens may be expended to do the following:

**• After this unit completes a Melee Attack: **This unit restores 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of the Defender’s destroyed ranks.
**• When this unit performs a Charge Action, before resolving that action:** This unit may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice, and any enemies they successfully charge become **Panicked**.

**•When this unit performs a Melee Attack, before resolving that Attack:**
This Attack gains +2 Attack Dice.

Before being removed, this unit performs 1 Melee Attack using its lowest Attack Die Value. If this Attack destroys the Defender, this unit is not destroyed but remains in play with 1 Wound.

• While you Control [SWORDS], may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Might Of The Throne
Description: While your opponent does not Control [CROWN], each time this unit Attacks, it gains +1 Attack Die to Melee Attacks and counts as rolling a 6 for all Charge Distance Dice.

Name: Mother of Dragons
Description: Once per game, at the start of any Turn, you may search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 of Daenerys' Commander cards and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

Name: Motivated By Coin
Description: While your opponent does not Control [MONEY], when performing a Melee Attack, this unit may re-roll Melee Attack Dice and, when this unit activates, it may restore 1 Wound.

Name: Motley Armaments
Description:
When Attacking, choose 1. If Attacking in the Flank or Rear, gain both:
• +1 Attack Die and **Critical blow**.
• Defender loses all Abilities this Turn.

Name: Mummer's Blade
Description: If Attacking an enemy that has not Activated this Round, before rolling Attack Dice, the Defender becomes **Weakened**.

Name: Names On The List
Description: Each time a friendly unit in long Range loses a Rank, place 1 Order token on this card. Each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, you may remove 1 Order token from this card. If you did, after the Attack is complete, destroy 1 Infantry Attachment from the Defender.

Name: Noble’s Wrath
Description:
• **Sundering**
• Deals +2 Hits for each Wound this unit has suffered.

Name: Oppressive Peacekeeping
Description: While you Control [CROWN], enemies in Short Range of this unit suffer -1 to Morale Test rolls.

Name: Order: Adaptive Planning
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 Combat Unit in Long Range. Replace 1 Condition token on that unit with any other Condition token.

Name: Order: Adaptive Style
Description: **When this unit Attacks or is Attacked, before rolling Attack Dice:** Choose 1: • This unit gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls and +2 to Panic Test rolls against this Attack. • This Attack gains Critical Blow and Sundering.

Name: Order: Battle Plan
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Discard 2 Tactics cards to search your Tactics Deck for any 1 card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

Name: Order: Charging Volley
Description:
**After this unit completes a Ranged Attack:**
This unit performs 1 Charge Action on the Defender.

Name: Order: Counterstrategy
Description:
**When an enemy in Short Range uses an Order or is targeted by a Tactics card:**
Roll a die. On a 3+, cancel the effect of that Order/Tactics card.

Name: Order: Deceitful Reposition
Description:
**At the Start of an enemy Turn, if no enemies are within Short Range:**
This unit performs a 3” Maneuver Action.

Name: Order: Divide The Spoils
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 friendly House Greyjoy unit in Long Range.
You may remove 1 Pillage token from that unit and then place 1 Pillage token on 1 other friendly House Greyjoy unit in Long Range of them.

Name: Order: Drowned God's Blessing
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 friendly Greyjoy Infantry unit in Short Range and choose 1:
• That unit restores 2 Wounds.
• That unit may re-roll any Attack Dice this Turn.
• Enemies that Attack that unit this Turn become **Vulnerable**.

Name: Order: Grisly Example
Description: **Start of any Turn:** This unit suffers 1 Hit. Target all enemies in Short Range. They become Panicked.

Name: Order: Hidden Traps
Description:
**When an unengaged enemy in Long Range performs any Action, before resolving that Action:**
Choose 1:
• That enemy suffers 1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.
• That enemy suffers -1[MOVEMENT] until the end of the Turn.

Name: Order: Hold The Line!
Description:
**When this unit Activates:**
Target 1 enemy engaged with this unit. It suffers 2 Hits, +1 Hit for each of this unit’s remaining ranks.

Name: Order: Incite
Description: **When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:** This Attack gains Vicious and rolls its highest Attack Die Value.

Name: Order: Just Shares
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 friendly Combat Unit in Long Range. Move 1 Pillage token from that unit to 1 other friendly unit with Pillage in Short Range of that unit.

Name: Order: King’s Blade
Description:
**After this unit is Attacked:**
Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 **Ours is The Fury!** and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

Name: Order: Lannister Supremacy
Description:
**After an enemy completes an Attack on this unit:**
Target the Attacker. They suffer 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll and +1 Wounds on failure for each remaining rank in this unit.

Name: Order: Laws of the Realm
Description:
**When an enemy in Short Range Attacks, before rolling Attack Dice:**
That enemy is treated as having -1 rank for Attack Dice. If it has only 1 remaining rank, it becomes **Vulnerable**.

Name: Order: Mark Target
Description: **Start of a friendly Turn:** Target 1 enemy in Line of Sight and Long Range. They become Vulnerable.

Name: Order: Martial Training
Description: **When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:** This Attack may re-roll any Attack Dice and the Defender becomes Vulnerable.

Name: Order: Noble's Bolster
Description:
**When a friendly Combat Unit in Long Range would gain a Condition token:**
It does not gain that token.

Name: Order: Overrun
Description:
**When this unit Surges forth:**
Instead of Surging Forth, this unit performs 1 Charge or March Action.

Name: Order: Overwatch
Description:
**After an enemy ends a March or Maneuver Action in Long Range and Line of Sight of this unit:**
This unit performs 1 Ranged Attack Action on that enemy.

Name: Order: Pit Fighter Rage
Description: **When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:** The Defender becomes Vulnerable, Panicked and Weakened. After this Attack has been completed, the Attacker suffers 2 Wounds.

Name: Order: Planned Approach
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 friendly unit in Long Range. Until the end of the Turn, that unit may not be targeted by enemy effects or abilities.

Name: Order: Queen’s Blade
Description:
**When a friendly R’hllor unit in Short Range is Attacked, before rolling Attack Dice:**
Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 **Baratheon Justice** card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.

Name: Order: Quick Fire
Description:
**After this unit completes a Maneuver or Retreat Action:**
This unit performs 1 Ranged Attack Action.

Name: Order: Raven Flock
Description:
**When an enemy in Long Range performs an Attack, before resolving that Attack:**
That Attack suffers -1 to Hit.

Name: Order: Ready! Aim! Release!
Description:
**When an enemy performs a Charge Action on this unit, before resolving that Charge Action:**
If being Charged from the Front, this unit performs 1 Ranged Attack Action on that enemy using its lowest Attack Die Value.

Name: Order: Reckless Heroism
Description:
**When this unit performs a Charge Action, before resolving that Action:**
This unit suffers D3 Wounds, but counts as rolling a 6 on all Charge Distance Dice.

Name: Order: Resilience
Description:
**When an enemy is performing an Attack on this unit, after Attack Dice are rolled:**
This unit only suffers 1 Wound for every 2 unblocked Hits.

Name: Order: Scavenge
Description:
**After an enemy completes an Attack on this unit:**
This unit gains 1 Pillage token.

Name: Order: Scout Openings
Description:
**Start of a friendly Turn:**
Target 1 enemy in Long Range. Until the end of the Turn, friendly unit’s Attacks on that enemy may re-roll any Attack Dice and gain **Precision**.

Name: Order: Sentinel
Description:
**After another friendly unit in Long Range is Attacked:**
This unit performs 1 Charge or Maneuver Action. If Charging, it must target the Attacker.

Name: Order: Set an Example
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target all enemies in Short Range. They become Panicked. Roll a die, on a 6, destroy Theon.

Name: Order: Set for Charge
Description:
**When this unit is Successfully Charged from the Front or Flank:**
If this unit is not engaged with another enemy, it performs 1 Melee Attack Action on the Attacker before they perform their Melee Attack.

Name: Order: Shield Wall
Description:
**When an enemy is performing a Melee Attack on this unit, after rolling Defense Dice:**
If this unit is being Attacked from the Front or Flank, it blocks +1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.

Name: Order: Shieldwall
Description:
**When an enemy performs a Melee Attack on this unit, after rolling Defense Dice:**
If this unit is being Attacked from the Front or Flank, it blocks +1 Hit for each of its remaining ranks.

Name: Order: Sow Discord
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 enemy in Long Range. They suffer 1 Morale Test with -1 to their roll for each of their destroyed ranks. On a failure, they lose all Abilities until the end of the Round.

Name: Order: Spread Fear
Description:
**When an enemy engaged with this unit fails a Panic Test:**
Target 1 other enemy in Long Range of this unit. It suffers 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll for each remaining rank in this unit. On failure, it suffers +1 Wound.

Name: Order: Stark Fury
Description: **When this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:** This Attack gains Critical Blow and Sundering. After completing this Attack, this unit suffers 2 Wounds, -1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

Name: Order: Stay At Your Posts!
Description:
**When a friendly unit in Short Range passes a Morale Test:**
That unit restores 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

Name: Order: Strange Relics
Description:
**When this unit Activates:**
This unit suffers 1 Wound. Target 1 enemy in Long Range. They gain 1 Condition token.

Name: Order: Superior Flanking
Description:
**When a friendly unit in Long Range performs an Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:**
If Attacking the Defender in the Flank or Rear, the Defender becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.

Name: Order: Supply Aid
Description:
**Start of a friendly Turn:**
This unit suffers up to 3 Wounds. Restore 1+ that many Wounds to 1 other friendly unit in Long Range.

Name: Order: Swift Retreat
Description:
**After an enemy completes a Melee Attack on this unit:**
This unit performs 1 Retreat Action.

Name: Order: Tactical Reposition
Description:
**Start of an enemy Turn:**
Target 1 friendly unit in Short Range. They perform a 3" shift.

Name: Order: Taking a New Name
Description:
**Start of a friendly Turn:**
Destroy this model and replace it with 1 destroyed Infantry Attachment. That Attachment gains **Order: Taking a New Name**. It counts as already having been used this Round.

Name: Order: Taunt
Description:
**When an enemy in Long Range Activates:**
If that enemy could Attack or Charge this unit, and declares any Action other than an Attack or Charge that targets this unit this Turn, before performing that Action, that enemy becomes **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.

Name: Order: Thenn Supremacy
Description:
**After an enemy completes an Attack on this unit:**
Target the Attacker. They suffer 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll and +1 Wounds on failure for each remaining rank in this unit.

Name: Order: Threaten
Description:
**Start of a friendly Turn:**
Target 1 enemy in Line of Sight and Long Range. They become **Weakened**.

Name: Order: To The Last!
Description:
**When this unit would be destroyed:**
This unit performs 1 Morale Test. On a success, it is not destroyed but remains in play with 1 Wound, then becomes **Panicked** and **Vulnerable**.

Name: Order: Trapper's Tools
Description:
**Start of any Turn:**
Target 1 enemy within Short Range and Line of Sight of this unit. They become **Vulnerable** or **Weakened**. If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, they become both instead.

Name: Order: Trophy Collecting
Description:
**After a Rattleshirt's Commander Tactics card is attached to a friendly unit:**
Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 of Rattleshirt's Commander Tactics cards and attach it to this unit. Shuffle your Tactics deck.

Name: Order: Trophy Hunter
Description:
**When a friendly Combat Unit Activates:**
Search your Tactics Deck or discard pile for 1 Rattleshirt’s Commander Tactic card and add it to your hand.

Name: Order: Unsuspecting Charge
Description:
**When a friendly unit in Long Range Activates:**
That unit may not be the target of enemy Orders or Tactics cards this Turn. It must perform a Charge as its Action this Turn.

Name: Order: War Cry
Description: **Start of a friendly Turn:** This unit performs 1 Morale Test. On a Success, target 1 enemy in Long Range. It becomes Panicked or Vulnerable.

Name: Orders of the Crown (Cortnay Penrose)
Description:
Each time a friendly NCU Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Cortnay Penrose's unit performs 1 Maneuver or March Action.*

Name: Orders of the Crown (Joffrey Baratheon)
Description:
Each time a friendly NCU Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Joffrey Baratheon's unit performs 1 Maneuver or March Action.*

Name: Orders of the Crown (Preston Greenfield)
Description:
Each time a friendly NCU Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Preston Greenfield's unit performs 1 Maneuver or March Action.*

Name: Outflank
Description: You may hold this unit off the table *(In Reserve)* instead of Deploying it. At the start of any Round, if you are not the first player, you may place 1 unit from Reserve fully within Short Range of a Friendly or Flank table edge, unactivated.

Name: Outrider’s Bow
Description: If this unit has not performed the Maneuver from Cavalry this Turn, this Attack gains **Precision**, +1 to Hit and becomes [LONGRANGE].

Name: Pathfinder
Description: This unit ignores the Dangerous, Hindering, and Rough keywords.

Name: Perseverance and Valor
Description: Each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, it restores 1 Wound.

Name: Pirate's Blades
Description:
• **Critical Blow**
• If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, it rolls its highest Attack Die Value.
• After completing a Melee Attack, this unit restores 1 Wound for each Pillage token it has.

Name: Poisoned Gifts
Description: If this unit is a House Greyjoy unit, it deploys with 2 Pillage tokens. At the Start of Round 3, they become Panicked, Vulnerable and Weakened.

Name: Poisoned Tridents
Description:
Before rolling Attack Dice, choose 1:
• The Defender becomes **Weakened**.
• Attach 1 Crannog Poison card to the Defender.

Name: Prayers to R'hllor
Description:
This unit gains +2 to Morale Test rolls and begins the game with 1 Faith token. Each time it passes a Morale Test, it gains 1 Faith token. Faith tokens may be expended to do the following:
**•When this unit performs a Melee Attack, before resolving that Attack:**
This Attack gains Sundering and Vicious.
**•When an enemy in Long Range fails a Panic Test:**
Target 1 friendly unit in Long Range of this unit. For each Wound the enemy suffered from this test, restore 1 Wound to that friendly unit, up to 3.

Name: Precision
Description: This unit's Melee Attacks gain Precision.

Name: Predator's Instincts
Description:
• Each time this unit Charges, it suffers a Disorderly Charge on rolls of 1 or 2.
• Each time an enemy performs a Melee Attack on this unit, their Attack gains **Vicious**.
• When this model's Skinchanger unit Charges this unit, they may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.

Name: Prey On Fear
Description: Each time an enemy engaged with this unit fails a Panic Test, this unit restores 2 Wounds.

Name: Protection Of The Crown
Description: While you Control [CROWN], each time this unit is Attacked, it may re-roll any Defense Dice and opponents cannot expend Vulnerable tokens on this unit.

Name: Pummeling Fists
Description:
• **Critical Blow**
• **Sundering**

Name: Queen's Blade
Description: While your opponent does not Control [CROWN], opponents cannot expend **Vulnerable** and **Panic** tokens on this unit.

Name: Raided Armaments
Description: If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, it gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls.

Name: Raiders Of The Free Cities
Description:
Each time this unit destroys an enemy rank with a Melee Attack, after that Attack is completed, it gains 1 Pillage token. A unit may have up to 2 Pillage tokens at any time. 
That unit gains the following based on the number of Pillage tokens *(effects are cumulative)*: 
• **1+**: +1 to Morale Test rolls. 
• **2**: +1 Attack Die.

Name: Rally Banner
Description: Each time a friendly unit in Short Range passes a Morale Test, that unit restores 1 Wound.

Name: Rally Cry
Description: Each time this unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, target 1 other friendly unit in Long Range. It restores 2 Wounds.

Name: Rally Point
Description: Friendly units in Short Range may use this unit's Morale Stat for all Morale Tests.

Name: Rally The Smallfolk
Description: After this unit completes a Melee Attack, if this Attack destroyed an enemy rank, target 1 friendly Infantry unit in Long Range. They restore 2 Wounds.

Name: Rampage
Description: • Critical Blow • Sundering • Before rolling Attack Dice, the Defender becomes Panicked. • When Charging, this unit may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.

Name: Ranging Specialist (Benjen)
Description: Benjen may only be Attached to Ranger units.

Name: Reaper's Fervor
Description: Each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, if this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, the Defender becomes **Panicked** and, if they fail the Panic Test from this Attack, suffer +1 Wound.

Name: Reaver Axes
Description:
• **Sundering**
If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, it may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Reckless Strikes
Description: This unit's Melee Attack gain Critical Blow and Precision. For each Attack Die roll of 1, this unit suffers 1 Wound.

Name: Recruiting From The Hills
Description: Each time this unit Activates, it restores 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

Name: Regroup
Description: After completing a Retreat Action, this unit restores 2 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

Name: Reinforcements
Description: Each time this unit Activates, it restores 1 Wound. If you Control [CROWN], restore +1 Wound.

Name: Relentless
Description: After this unit is Attacked, this unit may perform 1 Melee Attack Action.

Name: Renly's Protector
Description: After Renly Baratheon’s unit is Attacked, this unit performs 1 Attack or Charge Action on the Attacker.

Name: Renly's Retinue
Description: This unit has 8 models *(including Renly)*, 8 Wounds, and 2 ranks.

Name: Resolute Strikes
Description:
• **Critical Blow**
• Gains +1 to Hit for each of this unit’s destroyed ranks.

Name: Rock Volley
Description:
• **Vicious**
• Cannot Attack Solo units.
• May Attack enemies regardless of range and Line of Sight.
• If this Attack generates any Hits, instead of rolling Defense Dice, the Defender suffers 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of its remaining ranks.

Name: Roose's Vassal
Description: This model counts as Roose Bolton for all game effects.

Name: Ruthless Aggression
Description:
• **Vicious**
• When Attacking enemies that have not Activated this Round, may re-roll Attack Dice and the Defender becomes **Vulnerable**.

Name: Ruthless Volley
Description:
• Ignores units and terrain when determining Line of Sight.
• When Attacking engaged enemies, gains **Precision** and may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Sabotage and Subvert
Description: Once per game, at the start of any Turn, your opponent may deal this unit 1 Wound *(remove this model)*. If they do, they place 1 Condition token on this unit, and it may not use Orders or be the target of friendly Tactics cards this Turn.

Name: Sadistic Mutilation
Description: After this unit completes a Melee Attack, you may expend 1 Weakened token from the Defender. If you do, destroy 1 Infantry Attachment in that unit.

Name: Savage Mauling
Description: • **Sundering**

Name: Scimitar
Description: • **Critical Blow**

Name: Screamer's Arakh
Description: • **Sundering**

Name: Shared Fear
Description: Each time this unit fails a Panic Test, all enemies within Short Range of this unit become **Panicked**.

Name: Sic 'Em
Description: This unit may always re-roll Charge Distance Dice. Enemies this unit Successfully Charge become Panicked.

Name: Solo Rider
Description:
• This unit has 3 Wounds.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.

Name: Southern Knowledge
Description: Once per game, at the Start of any Turn, target 1 enemy in Long Range and Line of Sight. Until the end of the Turn, they lose all Abilities and cannot be the target of friendly Tactics cards.

Name: Spear & Net
Description: After completing this Attack, the Defender becomes Weakened.

Name: Spear and Maul
Description:
• **Vicious**
• **Sundering**
• **Precision**

Name: Spiked Flail
Description: • Vicious

Name: Spotter
Description: When Attacking enemies in Long Range of this unit, friendly War Machine units may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Stag’s Fury
Description:
This Attack gains the following based on the Game Round *(effects are cumulative)*:
**• 2+:** **Critical Blow**
**• 3+:** **Vicious**
**• 4+:** **Sundering**
**• 5+:** Deals +1 Hit for each of this unit’s remaining ranks.

Name: Stake Building
Description: Once per game, at the start of any Round, place 1 Stake terrain with the Dangerous and Destructible Keywords within 2" of this unit. This terrain may not be placed over other terrain or units.

Name: Stake Mountings
Description: When this unit is Successfully Charged, before the Attacker performs their Melee Attack, they suffer D3+1 Wounds.

Name: Stalwart
Description: This unit gains +2 to Morale Test rolls.

Name: Stand Your Ground!
Description: Each time an enemy performs a Melee Attack on this unit, if this unit is only engaged with 1 enemy, that enemy does not gain Charge, Flank, or Rear Bonuses.

Name: Starfall Lance
Description:
• **Sundering**
• When Charging, rolls +2 Attack Dice for each remaining ranks in this unit.
• If Attacking an enemy in the Flank or Rear, before rolling Attack Dice, that enemy becomes **Panicked** and **Weakened**.

Name: Stomp
Description:
• **Vicious**
• Defenders do not roll Defense Dice.
• When Charging, gains +1 Attack Die for each of the Defender’s remaining ranks.

Name: Stubborn Tenacity
Description: Each time this unit passes a Panic Test, 1 enemy they are engaged with suffers 1 Wound.

Name: Sundering
Description: This unit's Melee Attacks gain Sundering.

Name: Superior Numbers
Description: When attacking enemies with the same or fewer remaining ranks, this unit’s Melee Attacks may re-roll any Attack Dice and opponents cannot expend Weakened tokens on this unit.

Name: Swift Strike
Description: After this Attack is completed, this unit may perform 1 Retreat Action.

Name: Tactical Strike
Description:
• **Sundering**
• While you control [LETTER], this attack rolls its highest Attack Die Value.

Name: The King Is Dead!
Description: When Mance is destroyed, your opponent gains 2 Victory Points and each of your units in Long Range becomes **Panicked**.

Name: The Kraken's Dues
Description:
When this unit Activates, if this unit is a House Greyjoy unit, you may target 1 other friendly House Greyjoy unit.
You may remove 1 Pillage token from that unit and place it on this unit.
Then, you may remove 1 Pillage token from this unit to restore up to 2 Wounds to this unit.

Name: The Mountain That Rides
Description:
• This unit has 4 Wounds.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver action.

Name: The Mountain's Strength
Description: • This unit's Melee Attacks gain **Sundering** and deal +2 Wounds.

Name: The Rightful Queen
Description:
Each time a friendly NCU Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Search your Tactics Deck for 1 of Daenerys' Commander cards and add it to your hand. Shuffle your Tactics Deck.*

Name: The Silence's Infamy
Description: If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, enemies in Short Range suffer -1 to Morale Test rolls.

Name: To The Last!
Description: Place 2 [WOUND] tokens on this card at the start of the game. Each time this unit would be destroyed, remove 1 [WOUND] token from this card. It makes 1 Morale Test. On a success, this unit is not destroyed but remains in play with 1 Wound.

Name: Tooth & Claw
Description: • **Sundering**

Name: Tracker’s Bow
Description: After completing this Attack, the Defender becomes **Vulnerable**.

Name: Trample
Description:
Each time this unit performs a March Action, it may replace that Action with a Trample Action:
Pivot it, then move it 12”, moving through units. If it ends over a unit, it instead stops 1” before it. Each non-Solo unit moved through, or that it would have ended on, suffers D3 Wounds.

Name: Trophy Collector
Description: This unit may treat any Rattleshirt’s Commander Tactics cards attached to friendly units within Short Range as also attached to them.

Name: True Bond
Description:
• Ghost may treat any friendly Tactics cards attached to Jon Snow's unit as also attached to him.
• When Jon Snow's unit Activates, this unit may Activate after that unit.

Name: True Conviction (Baratheon)
Description: If this unit is a Baratheon unit, each time it Attacks an enemy with the same or more remaining ranks, it may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: True Conviction (Martell)
Description: If this unit is a Martell unit, each time it Attacks an enemy with the same or more remaining ranks, it may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Uncontrolled Rage
Description: Each time this unit Activates, if it can Charge an enemy, it performs 1 Morale Test. On a failure, it performs 1 Charge Action on the nearest valid enemy and counts as rolling a 6 for all Charge Distance Dice.

Name: Unfaltering Conviction
Description:
Each time a friendly Combat Unit is destroyed, place 1 Order token on Marselen. This unit gains the following based on the number of tokens:
• 2+: Unit's Attacks gain +1 to Hit.
• 3+: Unit gains +1 to Defense Dice rolls.

Name: Unleashed Ferocity
Description: Each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice, target the Defender. For each of this unit’s destroyed ranks, the Defender becomes **Panicked** or **Vulnerable**.

Name: Unstoppable Wrath
Description: This unit's Melee Attacks deal +2 Wounds.

Name: Unsullied Prowess
Description:
• **Precision**
• May always re-roll Attack Dice.
• Opponents cannot expend **Weakened** tokens on this unit while it is Attacking.

Name: Untrained Masses
Description:
• This unit has 6 Wounds.
• Cannot Control Objectives and cannot grant Victory Points. 
• Start of the Round, if this unit is not in Short Range of a friendly unit without **Untrained Masses**, it is destroyed.

Name: Unyielding
Description: This unit suffers -1 Wound from failing Panic Tests for each of its destroyed ranks.

Name: Valuable Captive (Jaime Lannister)
Description: This unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls. When Jaime is destroyed, your opponent gains 1 Victory Point.

Name: Valuable Captive (Rickon Stark)
Description: This unit gains +1 to Morale Test rolls. When Rickon is destroyed, your opponent gains 1 Victory Point.

Name: Varamyr's Eagle
Description: At the start of each Round, attach this card to 1 enemy Combat Unit until the end of the Round, placing this model near the unit's tray to mark it. This model is ignored for all other purposes.

Name: Varamyr's Scout
Description: Once each Turn, when this unit performs a Maneuver or March Action, before resolving that Action, 1 Varamyr, Shadowcat, or Wolf Pack unit may perform a 2" shift.

Name: Varamyr’s Shadowcat
Description:
• This unit has 2 Wounds.
• Cannot Control Objectives and cannot grant Victory Points.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver Action.
• This unit does not deploy as usual. At the start of any Round, you may deploy this unit fully within Short Range of any Flank table edge.

Name: Varamyr’s Wolf Pack
Description:
• This unit has 3 Wounds.
• Cannot Control Objectives and cannot grant Victory Points.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver Action.

Name: Vengeance Of The Crown
Description: After this unit is Attacked with a Melee Attack, if you Control [CROWN], the Attacker suffers 1 Wound, +1 Wound for each of this unit's destroyed ranks.

Name: Vengeful Captive
Description: While your opponent Controls [CROWN], this unit suffers -1 to Hit.

Name: Vicious
Description: This unit's Melee Attacks gain Vicious.

Name: Vicious Mauling
Description:
• **Sundering**
• **Vicious**
• Gains +1 Attack Die for each Wound this unit has suffered.

Name: Victarion's Vassal
Description: This model counts as Victarion Greyjoy for all abilities and effects.

Name: Violent Reactions
Description: After completing an Attack, this unit becomes Vulnerable.

Name: Viper's Fangs
Description: When Attacking enemies that have not Activated this Round, the Defender becomes **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.

Name: War Elephant
Description:
• This unit has 8 Wounds and cannot Control Objectives.
• This unit can only suffer a maximum of 2 Wounds from failing Panic Tests.
• Each time this unit would perform an Action, if there is no friendly Golden Company Infantry unit within Long Range, it must perform 1 Morale Test. On a failure, it does not perform that Action.

Name: War Flail
Description: • Vicious • When Charging, gains Critical Blow.

Name: War Hammer
Description: If the Defender rolls a 1 on any Defense Dice, after this Attack is completed, they become **Weakened**.

Name: War Machine
Description:
• This unit has 6 Wounds.
• This unit cannot Control Objectives.
• This unit cannot gain Condition tokens, Charge, Retreat, or Shift.

Name: Watcher's Crossbow
Description: • **Sundering**

Name: Water Dance
Description: Each time a rank in this unit is destroyed, target the Attacker, they become Vulnerable.

Name: Weaken Resolve
Description: Each time an enemy engaged with this unit fails a Panic Test, that enemy becomes Weakened.

Name: Westerosi Rider
Description:
• This unit has 3 Wounds.
• At the start of this unit’s Activation, it may perform 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.
• As long as Jorah is on the battlefield, increase your Tactics Hand Size limit by +1. You start the game with 4 cards and may draw up to 4 cards when refilling your hand.

Name: Whatever May Come
Description: Each time an enemy performs a Melee Attack on this unit, before rolling Attack Dice, you may destroy Jorah. If you do, that enemy becomes **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.

Name: Widower's Protector
Description: After The Widower's unit is Attacked, this unit performs 1 Attack or Charge Action on the Attacker.

Name: Wildfire
Description:
• **Vicious**
• Defenders do not roll Defense Dice.

Name: Winter's Bite
Description: • Critical Blow • If this unit has 1 or more destroyed ranks, gains +1 to Hit. • If this unit has 2 destroyed ranks, may re-roll any Attack Dice.

Name: Winterfell Supplies
Description: • Precision • While you Control [SWORDS], this unit's Melee Attacks roll their highest Attack Die Value.

Name: Winterfell's Wrath
Description: • Critical Blow • Enemies Successfully Charged become Weakened.

Name: Zealous Fanaticism
Description: This unit's Melee Attacks gain Vicious and always roll their highest Attack Die Value. This unit suffers 1 Wound for each Attack Die roll of 1.

Name: Zealous Resurgence
Description: Each time this unit Activates, it may expend 1 Faith token. If it does, it restores 2 Wounds.
